comments:
I just upgraded to Eclipse 3.2 RC1 and the latest dev build of AJDT. I'm seeing one error log entry for each character I type in a string that isn't closed, like this:

Reproduced - still happens with latest build on RC2

The exception is valid and expected, as the string is unterminated. It is our FFDC aspect which is being a bit keen in writing it to the log. I've excluded this programming by exception case from the aspect.

Fixed in latest dev build for Eclipse 3.2RC2.
